summary: TRUCK TIRES    WE WERE TRAVELING ALONG I 75 WHEN A TRUCK'S TRAILER TIRE EXPLODED CAUSING THE TRUCK SWERVE TOWARDS US FORCING US TO CHANGE LANES TO MISS THE TRUCK AND TIRE PIECES.    ON THIS TRIP WE SAW 4 OTHER TRUCKS HAVE FLAT TIRES AND AT LEAST 10 PLACES ON THE ROAD WE HAD TO AVOID PIECES OF TRUCK TIRES THAT HAD EXPLODED.  IN 20 YEARS OF MAKING THIS TRIP I NEVER SAW THIS MANY TRUCK TIRES EXPLODED.  *TR
